channel.title: ☆ Lorenthia ☆ 718/742 ☆ ECO/PK ☆ AutoVote ☆ AutoDonate ☆ Webclient ☆
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rwi1as.jpg[/img]
WEBSITE: [url=http://lorenthia.taalibia.com/]Lorenthia | Where Legends are Born.[/url] FORUMS:[url=http://lorenthia.ipbhost.com/]RS Private Server | Lorenthia | Community[/url] VOTE:[url=http://lorenthia.taalibia.com/vote/#?step=1]Lorenthia - Voting[/url]
[i]Tired of wasting your time on servers that don't go anywhere? Are you looking for a mature and dedicated development team? [b][color=Green]Lorenthia[/color][/b] is your answer with flawless systems, and a great community. You've come to the right place!
We've got everything and more! Our development team is dedicated and professional. We don't do thing's in halves or quarters and are always consistantly developing around the clock to guarantee you the best and most frequent content updates! [/i]
[b]Welcome to Lorenthia![/b] [b]Lorenthia[/b] is A RS Private Server, and has all the things you have to have in a 718 server. We are trying to make it better, and we do everything to our new players should feel fit and to enjoy [b]Lorenthia[/b]! The owner is active and he is trying to get better.
[b]Lots of MiniGames, such as:[/b] Crucible Fight Caves Fight Kiln Fight Pits Clan Wars Domion Tower Castle Wars Recipe for Disaster Barrows Duel Arena And much more! -
[b]Lots of Bosses to slay:[/b] Bandos Saradomin Armadyl Zamorak Nex Kalphite Queen Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Queen Black Dragon King Black Dragon Avator of Destruction We have almost all bosses added. ~ [b]And more:[/b] Many Training Spots Prestige Perfect Pking! Fully working Farming! Working Construction! Max/Comp Capes Active and Friendly Staff 24/7 VPS Weekly/Daily Updates Community Events Flower Games All Skills Are Trainable The owner listens to your suggestions Auto Vote Auto Donate Webclient And much more! -

item.title: ☆ Lorenthia ☆ 718/742 ☆ ECO/PK ☆ AutoVote ☆ AutoDonate ☆ Webclient ☆

item.description:
@Engineer wrote:

[center]

WEBSITE: Lorenthia | Where Legends are Born.
FORUMS:RS Private Server | Lorenthia | Community
VOTE:Lorenthia - Voting

[i]Tired of wasting your time on servers that don’t go anywhere? Are you looking for a mature and dedicated development team? [color=Green]Lorenthia[/color] is your answer with flawless systems, and a great community. You’ve come to the right place!

We’ve got everything and more! Our development team is dedicated and professional. We don’t do thing’s in halves or quarters and are always consistantly developing around the clock to guarantee you the best and most frequent content updates!
[/i]

Welcome to Lorenthia!
Lorenthia is A RS Private Server, and has all the things you have to have in a 718 server. We are trying to make it better, and we do everything to our new players should feel fit and to enjoy Lorenthia! The owner is active and he is trying to get better.

Lots of MiniGames, such as:
Crucible
Fight Caves
Fight Kiln
Fight Pits
Clan Wars
Domion Tower
Castle Wars
Recipe for Disaster
Barrows
Duel Arena
And much more!

Lots of Bosses to slay:
Bandos
Saradomin
Armadyl
Zamorak
Nex
Kalphite Queen
Corporeal Beast
Tormented Demons
Queen Black Dragon
King Black Dragon
Avator of Destruction
We have almost all bosses added.
~
And more:
Many Training Spots
Prestige
Perfect Pking!
Fully working Farming!
Working Construction!
Max/Comp Capes
Active and Friendly Staff
24/7 VPS
Weekly/Daily Updates
Community Events
Flower Games
All Skills Are Trainable
The owner listens to your suggestions
Auto Vote
Auto Donate
Webclient
And much more!

[/center]

Read full topic
